BodyCopy.p: Micro-captives and their material advisors have received some good news for the New Year from the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) in the form of IRS Notice 2017–08. The IRS has responded to numerous requests to extend certain "transactions of interest" disclosure reporting deadlines for participants in 831(b) captives and their material advisors from January 31, 2017, to May 1, 2017.
